scripts.build: npm run blog && npm run gzip && gulp
scripts.clean: selects path from './blog.jxck.io/**/*' where extname '=~' 'gz|br' | q | tee -a /dev/stderr | xargs -L 1 -P 4 rm
scripts.space: selects path from './blog.jxck.io/entries/**/*' where extname '==' '.md' | xargs -L 1 space.rb -ra
scripts.singler: selects path from './blog.jxck.io/entries/**/*' where extname '==' '.md' | xargs -L 1 singler
scripts.format: selects path from './blog.jxck.io/entries/**/*' where extname '==' '.md' | xargs -L 1 format.rb
